name: The Webhotelier Integrator
author: Halim Dash Developer

sections.description:
Plugin to integrate with Webhotelier API with options to display MULTIPLE promotions, booking engines and many more! Cut down on development effort and use this plugin.
Using a simple shortcodes allows you to display your promotions taken directly from WebHotelier.

It also comes with an built-in popup banner that you can utilise to promote offers. The popup banner is coded in Scalable Vector Graphics, hence you can change the text. But you cannot change the image at the moment. The banner is responsive, hence you do not need to worry about the display on mobile. It is coded to allowed only 2 popup per sessions so that it won’t annoy your visitors.

Example: [display_promotion apiuser=” apipass=” product_code=”]

By Dash Web Development
Contributor: Halim
